name: It Grows
description:
DISCLAMER : If I finally release a Web version, it will be a non-tested one. Good luck.

"Pepe Dante is a proud farmer from somewhere in New England. And this year, he's ready to tackle the hard job of farming once again. But the universe had other plans for him."

This si an entry for the Summer Slow Jams August 2020: Horror Games from @feilyn and me.

The style is OBVIOUSLY inspired by Don't Starve. We wanted to play with the 2D-on-3D effect a little. Also the story is an homage to the classic "The Colour Out of Space" by H.P. Lovecraft.

It was a first collaboration for Feilyn and me (and, let's be frank, one of the rare collaboration from me with anyone to be honest),  so the project ended a little bit less complete that hoped, by the fact that we had to learn how to work on the fly (and also because it was made while having a brand new day-job which is never an easy period of life).

This game will probably get another version soon. But for now, for the jam, this version will do :p.

Instruction and how to play are in the game. 

Enjoy!
